sentences.en: He particularly criticized the terminology in the document.
sentences.cn: 他特别批评了文件中使用的术语.

sentences.en: In biological terminology life is divided into two groups: plants and animals.
sentences.cn: 在生物学术语中,生物分为两大类: 植物和动物.

sentences.en: It's couched in such very user-unfriendly terminology.
sentences.cn: 文中使用了令用户敬而远之的术语。

sentences.en: Its refined terminology and class distinctions are frequently meaningful for engineering work.
sentences.cn: 其精练的名词术语与分类特征常常对工程是有意义的.
应避免使用意义含糊的术语.

sentences.en: Most readers are likely to lose interest when he descends into the realms of rhetorical terminology.
sentences.cn: 他开始讨论修辞术语,大多数读者很可能会失去兴趣.

sentences.en: Terminology can be very confusing because numerous terms have arisen in various disciplines.
sentences.cn: 多数术语起源于不同的学科,故容易混淆.

sentences.en: The article uses rather specialized musical terminology.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章用了相当专业的音乐术语.

sentences.en: The disagreement arose over a different use of terminology.
sentences.cn: 分歧的缘起在于专门用语使用的不同。

sentences.en: The particularly loose terminology of folk art studies further confuses the matter of definitions.
sentences.cn: 民间艺术研究中不精确的专有名词使定义更加混乱.

sentences.en: The reason for the terminology will become clear shortly.
sentences.cn: 命名理由稍后就会清楚.

sentences.en: The terminology of early forms is badly confused.
sentences.cn: 早期一些舞蹈形式的称呼已经模糊不清.

sentences.en: The word'shell " is used extensively in the terminology of atomic physics.
sentences.cn: 在原子物理学的术语中, “ 壳层 ” 一词是经常使用的.

sentences.en: We will use their own terminology even though it belongs to the " genetic " category.
sentences.cn: 我们将采用它们自己的术语,即使它们是属于 “ 遗传学 ” 范畴的.

words.tran_cn: 术语的；术语学的；专门名词的

phrases.tran_cn: 专门词汇；技术名词命名法

trans.tran_cn: 专门名词，术语，术语学，用辞
trans.tran_en: the technical words or expressions that are used in a particular subject
